ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dex/Agi/Where to go...
ygData.msgSnippet: Did you (all of you) know that if you stamina stat is 100 or better, you can lose every bub on the sta bar and still not have detrimental effects from loss of
ygData.messageBody:
Did you (all of you) know that if you stamina stat is 100 or better, you can
lose every bub on the sta bar and still not have detrimental effects from
loss of stamina (ie: you dont lose speed in swinging weps.) A warrior
friend of mine has his sta over 100 and says he would not bother with food
or drink were it not for those annoying messages.

So for you "battle bards" that like to or have to melee, get your sta over
100 and forget about jig of vigor.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 6:33 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dex/Agi/Where to go...


> two... my Staff of Writhing and Kisch (*sighs*... I love my Kisch) are
> nifty, but they really suck the stamina outta me in longer fights :o/
